text: Bonke Innocent (born 20 January 1996) is a Nigerian professional footballer who plays for Swedish club Malmö FF, as a defensive midfielder. ==Career== On 2 August 2017, Malmö FF announced the signing of Innocent on a contract until 2021 for a fee of €800 000. == Career statistics == ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Appearances and goals by club, season and competition |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|National Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan="5" valign="center"|Lillestrøm |2014 |rowspan="4" valign="center"|Tippeligaen |1||0||0||0||colspan="2"|–||1||0 |- |2015 |20||0||2||0||colspan="2"|–||22||0 |- |2016 |24||0||2||0||colspan="2"|–||26||0 |- |2017 |9||0||2||1||colspan="2"|–||11||1 |- !colspan="2"|Total !54!!0!!6!!1!!0!!0!!60!!1 |- |rowspan="5" valign="center"|Malmö FF |2017 |rowspan="4" valign="center"|Allsvenskan |2||0||0||0||0||0||2||0 |- |2018 |15||0||1||0||5||0||21||0 |- |2019 |11||0||1||0||6||0||18||0 |- |2020 |13||0||2||0||1||0||16||0 |- !colspan="2"|Total !41!!0!!4!!0!!12!!0!!57!!0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !95!!0!!10!!1!!12!!0!!117!!1 |} ==References== Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Nigerian footballers Category:Nigerian expatriate footballers Category:Nigerian expatriate sportspeople in Norway Category:Expatriate footballers in Norway Category:Lillestrøm SK players Category:Malmö FF players Category:Allsvenskan players Category:Eliteserien players Category:Sportspeople from Kaduna Category:Association football midfielders
